document_data.caption: A map showing the Volomir River in the Spider Swamp.
document_data.name: Volomir River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Volomir River''' was a small waterway found in the far eastern corner of [[Calimshan]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}<ref name=EotSS.M">
document_data.Geography: The river flowed through the [[Spider Swamp]]. It originated on the northern end of the swamp near the edge of the [[Forest of Mir]] and flowed south for approximately {{SI|50|mi|k|long=yes}} until it reached the coast and the [[Shining Sea]].<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
document_data.Notable Locations: The ruins of [[Lost Ajhuutal]] were found just off the eastern bank near the river's source.<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
